title: Tamed All Night - Book Four: Her Sweet Surrender
description: Suzy and Ruben continue their battle of wits and of the sexes to its final conclusion. The harder she resists his demands the more she wants to give in, but her world of chaos threatens to bring him and his empire to its knees. Neither of these smart cookies will ever give in, not without a fight to the bitter end, no matter how sizzling, crackling and spine tingling the sexual tension between them becomes, but in this epic struggle to the bedroom there can only be one winner. Download now to find out who comes out on top and dig deeper into the worlds of the gorgeous Hargrave brothers and their dangerously sexy associate, Ruben Mayweather.
author: Drew Sinclair
